turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Rusty Day.
turn.1: What happened in 1992 to Rusty Day?
turn.2: Day, having turned down AC/DC's request to have him join their band to replace Bon Scott, and Rossington-Collins's request to have him replace Ronnie Van Zant, eventually formed Uncle Acid & The Permanent Damage Band which scored him a deal with Epic Records.
turn.3: What other bands did he form?
turn.4: Rusty Day formed his last band; The Rusty Day Band in 1979 and hired Jacksonville guitarist Mike Owings.
turn.5: Who were some of his band mates?
turn.6: Mike Owings had just left the Jacksonville, Florida band Lizzie Borden with Steve Gaines' brother; Bob Gaines as drummer.
turn.7: Did anyone else join his band?
turn.8: Owings was 20 years old and has since been a member of The Allen Collins Band , Molly Hatchet , David Allan Coe and is currently bandleader of the Jacksonville, Florida group .
turn.10: Day was fatally shot at his home on June 3, 1982.
turn.12: His son, his dog, and Garth McRae were also fatally shot during the same attack.
